author: craigmcc
msg: Add convenience accessors for request parameters as well, since this is a
common way to communicate information between pages.

author: jsisson
msg: GERONIMO-2035 - fix minor problems that may occur in very rare situations.  Ensure FileOutputStream is closed if JarOutputStream constructor throws exception.  Move call to  ConfigurationStoreUtil.ChecksumOutputStream constructor inside try block to ensure zip entry gets closed (in finally block) if exception is thrown during construction.

author: aadamchik
msg: changing the algorithm, removing an kludge that was supposed to support early versions of nested DC, and doesn't seem to be needed now.

author: felicity
msg: add in additional mirror for sa-update
